CSCI P-14110 Introduction to Programming, Computational Science, and Data Visualization

This is the course website CSCI P-14110

Lesson 7 - Info Viz Examples

Today we will cover more on widgets in python and how to combine them to make interactive plots in Jupyter notebooks.

If we have time, we will build a dashboard with a Bloomberg tool called bqplot.

  • Part2_programming_heatMap_lesson07.pdf
